From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To trace error recovery in memory using caches, use the **memory cache error-recovery** command in global configuration mode. To disable the memory cache error recovery mechanisms, use the **no** form of this command.
CLIs: memory cache error-recovery { L1 | L2 | L3 } { data | inst }
no memory cache error-recovery { L1 | L2 | L3 } { data | inst }

ParaDef.Info: Specifies if data recovery is required.
Specifies if instruction recovery is required.

Examples: The following example shows how to enable the memory cache error-recovery command:

RelatedCmds.description: Traces error recovery in memory using caches through set options.
